body_html: @carpodaster Ah sorry, I think I am confused about the roles again... What's a person that is assigned to a team as a Mentor called? Currently there is the possibility for people that have been added to a team as “Mentors” to view the mentor dashboard — this PR would remove that possibility. so I was wondering whether we would still want that or not.

Currently there is the possibility for people that have been added to a team as “Mentors” to view the mentor dashboard — this PR would remove that possibility. so I was wondering whether we would still want that or not.
body: @carpodaster Ah sorry, I think I am confused about the roles again... What's a person that is assigned to a team as a Mentor called? Currently there is the possibility for people that have been added to a team as “Mentors” to view the mentor dashboard — this PR would remove that possibility. so I was wondering whether we would still want that or not.
